wordGroup: come to a standstill 停住；停滞不前

sentences.en: Normal life is at a standstill, and the economy is faltering.
sentences.cn: 正常生活陷入停滞，经济正在衰退。

sentences.en: One vehicle with a flat tyre can bring the motorway to a standstill.
sentences.cn: 一辆轮胎瘪掉的汽车就能导致公路交通的停顿。

sentences.en: Investigations have ground to a standstill because no witnesses have come forward.
sentences.cn: 调查已陷入一种停滞状态，因为没有证人出来作证。
